articles.title: Gane Gets Another Shot ‚Äî Is Aspinall Still the Heavy Favorite?
articles.description: Start fresh at https://tryfum.com/products/zero-crisp-mint. Over 500,000 people have already made the switch ‚Äî no nicotine, no vapor, no batteries. Just flavor, fidget, and a fresh start. UFC 321's main event ended in controversy as Tom Aspinall's first title defense against Ciryl Gane was halted due to an accidental eye poke. Despite the no-contest outcome, the question remains: Is Aspinall still the favorite in a potential rematch? In this video, Chael Analyzes the fight's dynamics, examining Aspinall's striking power and Gane's defensive skills. We also discuss the psychological impact on both fighters and speculate on how the betting odds might shift for a future bout. Join us as we break down the key moments and what they mean for the heavyweight division. Tom Aspinall, Ciryl Gane, UFC 321, heavyweight title, no contest, eye poke, UFC rematch, betting odds, UFC analysis, UFC news. Her relentless ‚Äúwant-it‚Äù attitude set her apart. üìå Expect fight highlights, tactical analysis of Dern‚Äôs ground defense and offense, and insights into how she transformed adversity into triumph. #UFC #MackenzieDern #StrawweightChampion #FightAnalysis #MMAHighlights #TakedownDefense #UnderdogVictory Bad Guy Inc merch now available at https://BadGuyInc.com Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 All things UFC and MMA with the undefeated Bad Guy, Chael Sonnen. articles.title: Ciryl Gane on people SLEEPING ON HIM vs. Tom Aspinall, BAD loss to Jones | Daniel Cormier Check-In
articles.description: Ciryl Gane IS BACK on another episode of the Daniel Cormier Check-In series ahead of the TOUGHEST FIGHT of his career against UFC heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall. DC and Ciryl break down the Jon Jones first-round submission loss, and what went wrong for him that night. Cormier and Gane also compare Tom to his past opponents, and Ciryl explains why fighting guys like Francis Ngannou and Derrick Lewis will make the fight WAY TOUGHER for Aspinall. Plus, the guys talk Cory Sandhagen, Khabib's training camps, and so much more. And don't miss the moment DC tries to convince Nurmagomedov to give him his Rolex watch!
